Presenting at the APMS Conference 2022 in Gyeongju, South Korea

Jeongwon Park presented at the IFIP International Conference on Advances in Production Management Systems (APMS) conference 2022.
His presentation topic was “Average flow time estimation and its application for storage relocation in an order picking system”.
